long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annoyed by YouTube ads? Take back control with Youtube remove ads (or skip ads)! This extension automatically skips those pesky ads before, during, and after videos, letting you enjoy uninterrupted viewing. It's lightweight and fast, working seamlessly in the background for a smooth experience. No complicated setup needed, just install and enjoy!  However, keep in mind that some creators rely on ad revenue. If you love a channel, consider supporting them directly or using YouTube Premium. Download extension today for ad-free YouTube and experience the difference!
